levelList.name: Stoneshower
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] If the target has 5+ [Vibration], Base Power +1

levelList.name: Gather Stones
levelList.desc: [WinDuel] If target has [Vibration], Base Power +2

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

levelList.name: Rising Sloth
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 3 [Vibration] on target (max 3)
[WinDuel] This Skill gains Atk Weight +1 for every 5 [Vibration] on the target (max 2)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion] once for every [Vibration] Count on the target (max 2); then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 2

levelList.name: Guard
levelList.desc:
Inflict 2 [Vibration] against the Attacker when hit as long as there is remaining Shield HP
[WhenUse] Gain 3 Protection

levelList.name: Decay Collission
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] If the target has 5+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1

levelList.name: Torrent
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] If the target has [Sinking], Base Power +2

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [Sinking] and +2 [Sinking] Count against 2 random targets

levelList.name: Cascading Gloom
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 3 [Sinking] on target (max 3)
[WinDuel] This Skill gains Atk Weight +1 for every 5 [Sinking] on the target (max 2)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Next Coin Power +1 for every 3 [Sinking] on the target (3 times max)

levelList.name: Evade
levelList.desc:
If the target has less than 0 SP, Coin Power +1
If the target has 10+ [Sinking], Base Power +1
[OnSucceedEvade] Target loses 5 SP

levelList.name: Topple
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume 20 [BloodDinner]: gain 1 [BloodArmor] for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 10 [BloodArmor] (max 2)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 15 [Laceration] on self (max 3)

levelList.name: Wound
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume 20 [BloodDinner]: gain 1 [BloodArmor] for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 10 [BloodArmor] (max 2)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 15 [Laceration] on self (max 3)

levelList.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 4 - Sundering
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] If the target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] With this Skill, deal +20% more damage with every Stage of [BloodArmor] (max 60%)
[DefeatDuel] Consume 4 [BloodArmor]

levelList.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 11 - Impaling
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] For every 3 [Laceration] on the target, Base Power +1 (max 3)
[WinDuel] With this Skill, deal +20% more damage with every Stage of [BloodArmor] (max 60%)
[DefeatDuel] Consume 4 [BloodArmor]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target equal to its Count. Use up the target's [Laceration] Count down to 1

levelList.name: Variant Don Quixote Style: Sancho Arts 4 - Track
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with the most [Laceration]
[BeforeAttack] Atk Weight +1 for every 10 [BloodArmor] on self (max 3)
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on the target (max 3)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 30 [BloodDinner]: gain 1 [BloodArmor] and Coin Power +1 for every 15 [BloodDinner] consumed (max 2)
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 10 [Laceration], and activate [Laceration] immediately. Lose 1 [Laceration] Count
[EndSkill] Increase [BloodDinner] equal to the damage this Skill dealt

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Binding] next turn
- If this Skill consumed 30 [BloodDinner], inflict 2 additional [Binding]

levelList.name: Variant Don Quixote Style: Sancho Arts 3 - Ambush
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with the most [Laceration]
[BeforeAttack] Atk Weight +1 for every 10 [BloodArmor] on self (max 2)
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on the target (max 3)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 30 [BloodDinner]: gain 1 [BloodArmor] and Coin Power +1 for every 15 [BloodDinner] consumed (max 2)
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 10 [Laceration], and activate [Laceration] immediately. Lose 1 [Laceration] Count
[EndSkill] Increase [BloodDinner] equal to the damage this Skill dealt

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Paralysis] next turn
- If this Skill consumed 50 [BloodDinner], inflict 2 additional [Paralysis]

levelList.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 2 - Hardblood
levelList.desc:
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed
[StartBattle] Gain 1 [SwirlingBlood]
[StartBattle] Consume 100 [BloodDinner]; gain 1 [BloodArmor] and 20 Shield HP for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
- If this unit doesn't have enough [BloodDinner], gain 50 [Laceration], and activate it immediately. Lose 2 [Laceration] Count. Gain 200 Shield HP (this damage does not reduce this unit's HP to 0)
[DefeatDuel] As long as the Shield HP from this Skill remains, gain 3 [Vulnerable]
[DefeatDuel] This Skill deals -50% less damage
[EndSkill] End Combat Phase

levelList.name: La Aventura Ha Terminado
levelList.desc:
Deal +10% more damage for every [Laceration] on the target (max 200%)
Deal +10% more damage for every 3 [BloodArmor] (max 100%)
[StartBattle] Consume (45 - current SP) [BloodDinner] and heal up to 45 SP
- If there isn't enough [BloodDinner], gain 20 [Laceration] and heal up to 45 SP
- Gain Shield HP equal to remaining [BloodDinner] (max 100)
[WinDuel] Inflict 10 [Laceration]
[EndSkill] Increase [BloodDinner] by HP damage dealt against the target
[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, increase [BloodDinner] by the target's max HP

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 5 [Laceration] and +3 [Laceration] Count to all enemies except for the target

levelList.name: La Aventura Ha Terminado...
levelList.desc:
Deal +40% more damage for every 10 (sum of [Laceration] on all targets]) (max 200%)
Deal +10% more damage for every cumulative [BloodDinner] this unit consumed (max 100%)
[StartBattle] Consume (45 - current SP) [BloodDinner] and heal up to 45 SP
- If there isn't enough [BloodDinner], gain 20 [Laceration] and heal up to 45 SP
- Gain Shield HP equal to remaining [BloodDinner] (max 100)
[WinDuel] Inflict 10 [Laceration]
[EndSkill] Increase [BloodDinner] by HP damage dealt against the target
[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, increase [BloodDinner] by the target's max HP

levelList.name: Compression
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] Final Power +1 for every 5 [Breath] Potency on self (max 3)

levelList.name: Dismantle
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] Final Power +1 for every 3 [Breath] Potency on self (max 5)

coindescs.desc: [CriticalOnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

levelList.name: Conduct Analysis
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] At 10+ [Breath] Potency, consume [Breath] Potency to gain +2 Final Power for every 3 [Breath] Potency consumed (max 4)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If the target has 5+ [Vibration] Count, trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[CriticalOnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion] twice; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 2

levelList.name: Trigger Extinction Sequence
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume half of [Breath] Potency and Count on self
- Gain (sum of consumed [Breath] Potency and Count / 2) Final Power (max 20)
- Deal +(sum of consumed [Breath] Potency and Count x 2)% more damage (max 50%)
- +(sum of consumed [Breath] Potency and Count x 4)% more Damage on Critical Hit (max 100%)
[DefeatDuel] Reduce remaining [Breath] Count by half

coindescs.desc: If user took no HP damage last turn, guarantee a Crit
If user took HP damage last turn, does not Crit; instead, deal -80% less damage
[CriticalOnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion] thrice; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 3

levelList.name: Contemplation
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Final Power +1 for [Breath] Potency on self (max 5)
[WhenUse] Gain 4 [Breath] Potency
- If this unit has Shield, gain +2 [Breath] Count as well
